module.name: part_occurrence
module.purpose: The Part occurrence application module supports the requirement to represent occurrences or instances of parts in assemblies and in assemblies of assemblies.

inscope.li: the representation of an occurrence of a part in an assembly;
the identification of a unambiguous occurrence of a part in an assembly through a positional location related to the usage relationship;
the identification of a unambiguous occurrence of a part in an assembly through a unambiguous label or reference designator;
the identification of a unambiguous occurrence of a part in an assembly through a both a position and label;
the representation of an instance of a part in an assembly through its usage in a sub-assembly;
the identification of an instance of a part in an assembly through its usage in a sub-assembly through a label;
the identification of an instance of a part in an assembly through its usage in a sub-assembly through a positional location;
the identification of an instance of a part in an assembly through its usage in a sub-assembly through a positional location and a label.

outscope.li: all concepts not involved in the specification of the concepts of representing or identifying occurrences or instances of parts.

uof.name: Part_Occurrence
uof.description: The Part_Occurrence UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of an instance of a part in an assembly.
